about_the_game:
This art book is a collection of promotional/exclusive images released for the BL game The Divine Speaker from 2020 until 2021.



What does it contain?
  • 59 pages of SFW & NSFW artworks (uncensored) from talented artists Fuyuure and Alyssa Calderon
  • Two mini comics (Soren and Illran/Veras)
  • Our forever love
